metadata.title: CVE-2024-35834 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: xsk:recycle buffer in case Rx queue was full Add missing xsk_buff_free() callwhen __xsk_rcv_zc() failed to produce descriptor to XSK Rx queue.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
